column4: BP teams up with Tesla to venture into battery storage for windfarm
column5: LONDON BP has teamed up with Tesla to build its first battery storage project at one of its U.S. windfarms as part of a strategy to expand its renewable energy business  the energy group said on Tuesday.

column4: CORRECTED-BP teams up with Tesla to venture into battery storage for windfarm
column5: LONDON  April 10 BP has teamed up with Tesla to build its first battery storage project at one of its U.S. windfarms as part of a strategy to expand its renewable energy business  the energy group said on Tuesday.
